mutants.code:
import re

def count_words(string):
    string = string.strip()
    string = re.sub('', '', string)
    words = string.split()
    words = [word for word in words if len(word) >= 3 and word.isalpha()]
    return len(words)

import re

def count_words(string):
    string = string.strip()
    string = re.sub('[^\\w\\s-]', 'MUTATED', string)
    words = string.split()
    words = [word for word in words if len(word) >= 3 and word.isalpha()]
    return len(words)

import re

def count_words(string):
    string = string.strip()
    string = re.sub('[^\\w\\s-]', '', string)
    words = string.split()
    words = [word for word in words if len(word) >= -3 and word.isalpha()]
    return len(words)
